Applicant : Olsen, Mark
School (district) : White Pine STEM Academy (White Pine Charter Schools)
Role(s) : Middle School Teacher;Administrator;Postsecondary Instructor;
LinkedIn Profile : I would love to become more familiar with 3D printing, drones, computer science, and other typical STEM skills. I am always looking for ways to become more confident with STEM fields so as to help, students, parents, and community members work together at advancing and improving society. Curiosity always drives learning. 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* This will give me excellent insight as both an educator and administrator at a STEM charter school. I plan on providing students opportunities to learn and grow into the STEM field. I always support STEM education with studentsand my own childrenby providing opportunities to experience the STEM process and am looking for ways to expand my understanding and ability to educate people and be more involved in this field. 
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Remote
	* Hybrid
	* In-Person

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* No specific STEM domain experience


Instructional Experience:
	* Elementary: 
	* Secondary:  
	* Adult:
